item.title: Roads are disintegrating, 27th February
item.description:
The whole Warren Avenue and Farnaby Road towards Ravensbourne need to be resurfaced. What a waste of money filling potholes which will come back in a few weeks when the whole road surface is disintegrating. Where is all the money going?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warren Avenue, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Christmas tree, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dominion Drive, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected black bins, 27th February
item.description:
Dispute the report of missed collection on Wednesday 26th February, there was no response from the Council. Chased up with Customer Service- no reason given to the case number:101002082768 Called Street Cleaning Team on Friday at 16:00- “person you wish to contact is unavailable”. Great! No notes - no responsibility- but salaries are paid! On Enfield Council Website everyone should be working till 17:00. Were is then Street Cleaning Team one hour earlier on Friday?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Great Cambridge Road, Enfield
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycleway surface inadequate for cycling, 27th February
item.description:
Most of the surface on Paul St and Tabernacle Street is cracked, bumpy, has sunken ironworks, and dips, and is extremely inadequate and dangerous for cycling on what are meant to TfL funded Cycleways. Please make it smooth.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Scrutton Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste Spillage, 27th February
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 27/02/26 15:12 Refuse/Recycling Collection Lat/Long - 51.4163659, -0.0681311 what3words - alive.garden.taps Nearest address - 36 Orchard Grove, Penge, London, SE20 8DZ This mess was left all over the road opposite my house at 35 Orchard Grove when the bin men left today! Not their usual high standards. Can they please return to clear it asap? Reference - 5366120 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 27/02/2026 15:11 This mess was left all over the road opposite my house at 35 Orchard Grove when the bin men left today! Not their usual high standards. Can they please return to clear it asap?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Orchard Grove, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: When you come out of houses at the end of Templewood and West Heath Road you cannot see any traffic lights. THIS IS SO DANGEROUS., 27th February
item.description:
Hello, Temporary traffic lights cannot be seen from the flats and houses where Templewood Avenue meets West eath Road. There needs to be an additional set of traffic lights linked to the ones in Templewood Avenue which are too far away. its extremely DANGEROUS. The issue arose today and no warning letters were received about these new works.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Templewood Avenue, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
